name: Marie Zamora
introduction: Marie originated the role of Cosette in the Paris production of  Les Misérables. She has played many of the major female roles in musicals – Kate in KISS ME KATE, Sina Marnis in Pirandello’s LES NOUVELLES DE SICILE, Mrs. Barnum in BARNUM, Cornelia in LA COMTESSE DRACULA, Eugenie in LE VOYAGE DE MOZART A PRAGUE, among others. She has appeared in films and concerts worldwide as well as writing and directing.
